text: She gave birth to a baby boy in January. And Jamie - Lynn Sigler looked like she'd bounced back from baby fantastically while spotted on the beaches of the Bahamas with friends in Instagrams Wednesday. The Sopranos star, 37, turned heads in a white bikini which put her toned figure on full display while visiting the shoreline with Lance Bass, former member of NSync. In paradise! Jamie - Lynn Sigler looked great in pictures she shared photos from her vacation to the Bahamas this weekend The brunette wasn't hiding her toned tummy and full chest as she rubbed sunscreen on pal Lance Lance looked like he'd been investing in plenty of time at the gym, showing off his toned torso and pecs in a pair of tiny, retro swim
